meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Edging Toward Climate Pact As a deadline neared in Kyoto, Japan, negotiators from more than 150 nations inched toward a pact on cutting greenhouse gases. Page A18.
Oracle Shares Are Pounded Oracle Corporation shares plunged 29 percent on Nasdaq after the company reported weak earnings, citing Asian turmoil. Page D1.
Edging Toward Climate Pact As a deadline neared in Kyoto, Japan, negotiators from more than 150 nations inched toward a pact on cutting greenhouse gases. Page A18.
Oracle Shares Are Pounded Oracle Corporation shares plunged 29 percent on Nasdaq after the company reported weak earnings, citing Asian turmoil. Page D1.
Oxford Health Sees Loss Oxford Health Plans admitted it had underestimated the cost of health care and estimated it would report a $120 million loss. Page D1.
Ousted Player Speaks Out Latrell Sprewell apologized for assaulting his coach but said his career should not be ruined by one mistake. SportsWednesday, page C1.
